title: Nagarro Unpluggedddd
description:
Nagarro Unplugged is our opportunity to logout from our day to day work and show off a little the skills that we have on a broader platform.

This hackathon event is going to be one of many that we will begin to have on a regular basis at Nagarro.


Broad rules (we may add to these rules as the week goes by):
1. Teams can be 1-5 people.
2. You cannot use previously developed work - only fresh ideas thought up for this hackathon are allowed.
3. Your output should not violate any copyrights or intellectual property - so copying is not allowed.
4. For any arbitration needs, the decision of Nagarro's management team is final.

Register here: Team Registration Link. TEAM REGISTRATIONS END ON THURSDAY 6:00 PM (GMT+5:30).

title: BFSI - Credit card training
description:
Come and join us for an informative session on Credit Cards.
Presenter: Antreev Gill
Schedule: 11a to 1p, 14th July 2015
Duration: 2 hours
Venue: GP 28 training room

title: Sodexo Vouchers June'15
description:

title: Blood donation drive: July 2015
description:
We would like to invite you for blood donation drive on 15th July 2015 at Plot-14.


Complementary goody bags shall be provided to all donors.
